TextView.android:text:
This Section is used for adding Sequences to a Particular content,for which you've clicked edit.

Click plus button on the top right corner to add a sequence, which consists of Hint to recognise, and Content to remember.

By clicking on any sequence, you'll direct do to Editor activity.

Long press on any sequence to get the menu options. These are same as the Main Content options except that, the edit option will direct to the Sequence editor.
